evaluations.opinion: Innocean's selection as Agency of the Year demonstrates Korea's creative competitiveness on a global stage.

confirmed_facts: Innocean was selected as Agency of the Year at the 2025 One Asia Creative Awards.
This is the first time a Korean agency has received this honor.
Innocean won 12 awards at the ceremony, including top awards in Branded Entertainment and Creative Effectiveness.
The 'Night Fishing' campaign with Hyundai Motor earned the highest score and was named Campaign of the Year.

timeline.event: Innocean announced as Agency of the Year at One Asia Creative Awards.
